2082.subject: TURK
2082.descrlong: Alternative assessment for the third semester of Turkish. Freshmen and sophomore transfers attempting to satisfy the Language ULR through assessment must enroll in TURK 101, 102, 201, and 202 concurrently, except for international students who may enroll only in TURK 202. Junior and senior transfers attempting to satisfy the Language ULR through assessment, must enroll in TURK 101, 102, and 201, except for international students who may enroll only in TURK 201 or 202.
